Try the following exercises.

1. Install git on your computer
Linux
On Debian-based Linux distros (Ubuntu, Mint) the command is  
`sudo apt install git`
On RedHat (CentOS, Fedora), it is
`sudo yum install git`
On Arch it is
`sudo pacman -S git`

Windows


2. Go to GitHub and create an account

3. Clone the presentation repository to your GitHub account

4. Clone the presentation from **your** GitHub account to your local
computer
